data.title: Love the thin crust!
data.text: Thin and crispy crust with generous toppings. Also liked the house creamy Italian salad dressing. We will be back.

data.title: Great food, and great service!
data.text: One of my favorite places in Conway to eat, great pizzas, sandwiches, and the coldest beer! They also have the friendliest wait staff!

data.title: Dinner time
data.text: Excellent pizza.  I recommend the "Meatza".    Lots of fun during a Razorback football game.   Great for couples or groups.    Give them a try.

data.title: Good for team meetings!
data.text: Excellent food, cold beer and great prices.   My team really loved meeting here and have asked we do all future meetings here.   Good parking area as well.   Quick service by friendly staff

data.title: Great Food
data.text: The pizza is great and they have a great selection of drinks. They make a really good salad and there are cool paintings on the walls. There are multiple TVs so you won't miss the big game.

data.title: This is the best whole meal salad in town, not to mention their "to die for" salad dressing.
data.text: There salad is wonderful and the dressing is superb.  This is the only thing that I have ever gotten to eat when I go there because I like it so much.  I think they call it the salad supreme with the house dressing.  My daughter have tried the pizza and really enjoyed it as well.  It has a relaxed and sports bar feel to it.

data.title: Pizzas are small but good!
data.text: The service was great, and so was the food.  I just wish the pizzas were bigger, not unreasonably priced, but my husband can really put it away so we had to order a few!

data.title: Good food
data.text: We eat here a few times a month and always love the food. The people are great and always helpful. I would recommend this place for lunch or dinner to anyone.

data.title: Pretty good pizza and service.
data.text: Pizza was pretty good. Pizza's are small...we should have ordered more. The service was pretty good. We were in a very large group and they did pretty good. We would go back...but would order more pizza next time.

data.title: Love this place!
data.text: We come once or twice a week. The staff is great and the food is even better. I have been going to US Pizza since its start in Little Rock and as a newbie, order a half salad half sandwich. It is well worth it!

data.title: Great food, great service!
data.text: My husband and I went to US Pizza during Toad Suck Daze and the service was great! We always like the food there. We had an apatizer and small (Delicious!) salad. I drink a lot of tea and the waitress was great about refills. It was fun to be there with families, couples and some people we knew! The food is always good and fresh. We got our salads first, because they are quick to make. Then we had our apatizer (we asked for it this way!) we also like their pizza and sandwhiches!

data.title: Oh my God! Love this place!
data.text: If you're in the Conway area, you should definitely visit this U.S. Pizza. My husband and I ordered two small salad supremes and one 13 inch Dave's Favorite pizza, and we had plenty leftover. Both salad and pizza were Ah-maz-ing! The house dressing should be called crack dressing. I mean, that stuff was killer. I have never tasted salad dressing so good. The waitress was incredibly sweet and helpful. The place had a real community vibe to it. I can't wait to go back!

data.title: Stuffy Stix for the win
data.text: If you don't feel like eating a whole pizza, get the Stuffy Stix with a side of ranch. They're so good! I've never had anything here I didn't like.

data.title: Great thin crust pizza
data.text: Went on a Thursday night and it took about  30 minutes to get seated. Neat place and very friendly and caring staff. Amy Beth served us and helped choose our pizza. We had the spinach Alfredo and it was delicious. That and our small salads was plenty. Neat atmosphere. Will go back.

data.title: Loved the crust!
data.text: The pizza crust is thin and so crunchy! We enjoyed the Hawaiian pizza but we did have major indigestion after :-/ We believe it was the salsa that comes on the pizza. But in the moment we loved it! We also got the supreme salad-highly recommend this! Their homemade ranch is amazing too!

data.title: Dependable thin crust pizza and salad.
data.text:
Okay, yes - that is a weird title for this review but this location of U.S. Pizza is like that dependable friend you can always count on.  I have never had a bad meal at any location of U.S. Pizza, therefore the 'dependable' part of the title.  

On the flip side, the composition of the pizza itself is not going to make for a memorable meal.  Please understand I do not mean this in any sort of negative fashion - it is simply a reflection of the fact U.S. Pizza serves thin crust pizzas which are NOT overflowing with toppings.  

In order to describe the amount of toppings as best I can, I'll reference Goldilocks here - the toppings are NOT too many, nor are they too few - they are close to just right.  For my taste, I wish the toppings were just a bit more and then, I think this pizza would be as good as it can get.  

If you are a pizza fan, it is usually deep dish pizza that arouses the taste buds - not thin crust.  However, U.S. Pizza does thin crust as good as (if not better) than any other establishment.  One area of their thin crust that truly does stand out is the crust - the toasted, crunchy crust has a delightful taste.  

U.S. Pizza also makes a very good salad - a favorite of ours is the salad supreme with ham.  The salad comes with ample amounts of cheese, meat, mushrooms, onions, and green pepper (all of which can be requested on the side).  This salad is large enough to share if you are also ordering a pizza.

Bottom line: a visit to U.S. Pizza has never disappointed.  Solid and reliable - if not spectacular.

data.title: Awesome Pizza
data.text: US Pizza has the best crust and awesome salad dressing. Tops any others I've had all over the United States

data.title: Good Pizza and more
data.text: Love Pizza and this is one of the must haves in Conway. My wife and I usually share a large Salad supreme and a sandwich and that is plenty for us. Great little place owned by locals.

data.title: Great Pizza, Great Waitstaff
data.text: I went to this restaurant with my grandkids and family, based on the reviews on tripadvisor.  I was very pleased with that choice.  The kids loved their pizza, I got a salad which was great.  The waitress was wonderful and attentive and the manager checked on us also.  Great place to eat!

data.title: we will be back ....
data.text: Great pizza and really good salads....  wasn't very crowded the day we went not a lot of parking space, but they serve some of the best pizza around........
